text: Lier Basketball Club was a professional basketball club based in the municipality of Lier, Belgium. ==Honours and titles== Belgian League * Champions (2): 1970–71, 1971–72 Belgian Cup * Winners (1): 1974–75 * Runners- up (5): 1969–70, 1971–72, 1972–73, 1973–74, 1975–76 Category:Defunct basketball teams in Belgium
title: Lier B.B.C.
